entry.title: 前端第一次作业
entry.content:
//三角形for (let i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {    document.write("&nbsp".repeat(5 - i) + "&nbsp *".repeat(i) + "<br>")}document.write("<br>219970523彭景<br><br>")  //219970523彭景//平行四边形for (let i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {    document.write("&nbsp".repeat(5 - i) + "&nbsp *".repeat(5) + "<br>")}document.write("<br>219970523彭景<br><br>")//菱形for (let i = 1; i <= 3; i++) {    document.write("&nbsp ".repeat(3 - i) + " *".repeat(i * 2 - 1) + "<br>");}for (let i = 2; i >= 1; i--) {    document.write("&nbsp ".repeat(3 - i) + " *".repeat(i * 2 - 1) + "<br>");}

img:/img/homework01.png

/* 页脚与头图透明 */#footer { background: transparent !important;}#page-header { background: transparent !important;}/* 白天模式遮罩透明 */#footer::before { background: transparent !important;}#page-header::before { background: transparent !important;}/* 夜间模式遮罩透明 */[data-theme="dark"] #footer::before { background: transparent !important;}[data-theme="dark"] #page-header::before { background: transparent !important;}
